file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged line (rc = os.system(cmd)) appears in a custom setuptools Command class (Doc) that is only executed when the user explicitly runs a documentation build command (e.g., python setup.py doc). The command being executed is a static, well-known documentation generator (pdoc) with no dynamic or untrusted input. There is no evidence of obfuscation, network exfiltration, privilege escalation, or execution of arbitrary/untrusted code. The use of os.system in this context is a common, benign pattern in setup scripts for building documentation. The rest of the code is standard for a setup.py file, with no suspicious imports, payloads, or install-time execution hooks. Therefore, this is a false positive.

detection_points.full_match: * This package is executing OS commands in the setup.py file at munkres-1.1.4/setup.py:70
